${ModID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${ModID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a 0 or 1 cost card from your discard pile.

${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, add a *Golf *Ball into your hand.

${ModID}:GolfBall.NAME: Golf Ball
${ModID}:GolfBall.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to unused Block last turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Slapstick.NAME: Slapstick
${ModID}:Slapstick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle *Dramatic *Entrance, *Trip, or *Blind at random into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Ghost.NAME: Ghost
${ModID}:Ghost.DESCRIPTION: At the end of its turns, enemy loses !M! HP. NL Startup: Disguise this as another card.

${ModID}:LunchBox.NAME: Lunch Box
${ModID}:LunchBox.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Colorless card this turn is played twice. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Heal 3 HP.

${ModID}:ColorlessMastery.NAME: Colorless Mastery
${ModID}:ColorlessMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Colorless card, gain 1 Strength.
${ModID}:ColorlessMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Colorless card, gain 1 Strength.

${ModID}:VisitAMonastery.NAME: Visit a Monastery
${ModID}:VisitAMonastery.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next 3 turns, add into your hand: NL *Madness, *Purity, NL *Apotheosis.
${ModID}:VisitAMonastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of your next 3 turns, add into your hand: NL *Madness, *Purity, NL *Apotheosis.

${ModID}:ThePrism.NAME: The Prism
${ModID}:ThePrism.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Startup: Split into *Shards in your hand and each pile.
${ModID}:ThePrism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Startup: Split into *Shards+ in your hand and each pile.

${ModID}:PrismShard.NAME: Shard
${ModID}:PrismShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL After playing 3 Shards, add *The *Prism into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:PrismShard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL After playing 3 Shards, add *The *Prism+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RealityMaster.NAME: MC Reality
${ModID}:RealityMaster.DESCRIPTION: You know the drill; NL when you make a card, NL give it an upgrade NL for working so hard!
${ModID}:RealityMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate, that's great! NL You know the drill; NL when you make a card, NL give it an upgrade NL for working so hard!

${ModID}:AdventurersSword.NAME: Adventurer's Sword
${ModID}:AdventurersSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Triangle into your draw pile. NL If you're at Max HP, enemy loses !M! HP.
